Key Match Events: Ismaël Koné scored an outstanding goal to tie the match
Jonathan David put Canada in front with ten minutes to go
Luis Suárez scored an equalizer to tie the game at 2-2
Uruguay scored all four of their penalties in the shootout
Post-Match Reflections: It was a disappointing end to a memorable few weeks for Jesse Marsch and Canada
They should hold their heads high after challenging several of the best teams in the world en route to a fourth-place finish few people outside Canada thought possible
Miscellaneous Highlights: Dayne St. Clair made a huge save in stoppage time to keep Canada’s lead intact

Jonathan Osorio beat goalkeeper Sergio Rochet moments later, having an initial effort saved before heading the rebound toward goal, but Nahitan Nández made a great defensive play to clear the ball off the goal line
